about_the_game:
Step back into the action-packed world of G.I. Joe with the G.I. JOE: Wrath of Cobra digital soundtrack!

Composed by Tee Lopes, Kid Katana and featuring Johnny Gioeli, this electrifying OST reimagines the iconic music of the 80s and early 90s G.I. Joe universe, capturing the essence of The Great American Hero.

The soundtrack brings fresh energy to classic G.I. Joe themes, expertly blending nostalgic arrangements with modern twists.The music brings back the essence of the G.I. Joe legacy, transporting fans back to the days of heroic missions and the eternal battle against Cobra. Whether you're reliving those moments or discovering them anew, the G.I Joe : Wrath of Cobra soundtrack is a tribute to the legendary soundtracks that defined a generation.
